subject: JU3.5: trouble debugging tests with JBuilder
msgSnippet: Maybe I am not the first one asking this quest. We use JBuilder4 . Since our upgrade from JU3.2 to 3.5 is not any more possible to debug/use breakpoints in our
messageBody:
Maybe I am not the first one asking this quest.
We use JBuilder4 . Since our upgrade from JU3.2 to 3.5 is not any more
possible to debug/use breakpoints in our tests.

Since we use Weblogic (5.1) it was necessary to use the "-noloading"
property in nearly all our tests.

What is the solution?


Thank you,

Lucas Filz

Vienna
